event.event-info: This is a Gaming Event which is coordinated by electrical branch. There are three rounds that is Round-1, Round-2& Round-3.

round.name: Round 1
round.item: In round -1 there is a game with bucket and ice.

round.name: Round 2
round.item: In round-2 there is a game of brick and ice.

round.name: Round 3
round.item: In round-3 there is a game using plastic balls, clay pots and red chili powder.

event.event-info: This is a technical Event which is coordinated by electrical branch. There are three rounds that is Round-1, Round-2& Round-3.

round.name: Round 1
round.item: In round -1 there is some questions have to be solved by the participants.

round.name: Round 2
round.item: In second round participants have to design bridge circuit by necessary electrical equipments.

round.name: Round 3
round.item: After that in third round a switch board connection have to be performed by the participants.

event-rules.name: Event Rules
event-rules.item: This is a team event in which each team will consist of two members.It has two rounds.Round 1 is an elimination round from which 4 teams will be selected for Round 2.

round.name: Round 1
round.item: Written Test(Objective):Based on Aptitude,Reasoning,Renewable Energy,General Aspects of energy management and energy audit.(14/02/2017)

round.name: Round 2
round.item: This is the final round.Questions will be from the areas of energy management and energy audit,renewable energy,ECBC(Energy Conservation Building Codes),BEE schemes for energy savings,general idea about lighting system efficiency and HVAC systems.(15/02/2017)
